Posts.Content: I have metastatic breast cancer in each lung.  Since January I have been taking Xeloda, 7 days on (5 pills a day) and 7 days off.  One tumor is shrinking, the other is stable.  I am working with Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. Just wondering about side effects:  anyone experience chest pain--what I call three bean bags on my chest?  Not really painful, just annoying.  And primarily on the last days of my "on" week. Cheers to all you champions who have been on Xeloda for a long time.  You give me courage. Onward!
Posts.Title: Xeloda use

Posts.Content: On 5/18/2007 Soul Flower wrote: Am a breast cancer survivor currently taking Femara instead of Tamoxifen.  Would be interested in hearing from anyone who is also on Femara and the side effects encountered.  I am having trouble with arthritis and fatigue.  Have been on it 5 months. Diana I was on Femara for two years and fatigue was the main side effect.  Keep listening to your body and rest, rest, rest when it tells you you are tired.  Courage on your journey.  Amanda07
Posts.Title: Femara Side Effects
